item.title: “regrrr”: One-stop R-toolkit for Compiling Regression Results
item.description: Today, I released an R package “regrrr” on Cran. In strategy/management research, we always need to compile the regression results into the publishable format and sometimes plot the moderating effects. This package does the job. library(regrrr) data(mtcars) m0 <- lm(mpg ~ vs + carb + hp + wt, data = mtcars) m1 <- update(m0, . ~ . + wt * hp) m2 <- update(m1, . ~ . + wt * vs) cor.
